issues.message: Remove or refactor this statement; it has no side effects.
Rename function "createDaemon" to match the regular expression ^[a-z_][a-z0-9_]{2,}$.
Remove or refactor this statement; it has no side effects.

err_to_raise is used before it is defined. Move the definition before.
Replace this generic exception class with a more specific one.
Delete this unreachable code or refactor the code to make it reachable.
